sourcesContent:
<template>

  <v-app :style="{backgroundColor: '#333333'}">


    <transition name="page" mode="out-in">
      <router-view :key="$route.path">
    </router-view>
    </transition>
    
  </v-app>
</template>

<script>

import HelloWorld from './components/HelloWorld';

export default {
  name: 'App',
  components: {
    HelloWorld,
  },
  data: () => ({
    drawer: false,
    group: null,
    menuItems: [
      {title: "加班申請",link: '/OTsubmmit'},
      {title: "休假申請",link: '/leaveSubmmit'},
      {title: "打卡紀錄",link: '/recording'},
      {title: "補休累計時數",link: '/compensatoryTime'},
      {title: "職務代理人設定",link: '/agent'}
    ]
  }),
  watch: {
      group () {
        this.drawer = false
      },
    },
};
function myMenuFunction(x) {
  if(document.getElementById("myMenu").classList.toggle("change")){
    vm[1].myMenu.menuOpen = true;
  }
  else{
    vm[1].myMenu.menuOpen = false;
  }
}
</script>

<style>
#app {
  font-family: 'Microsoft JhengHei', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;
}
html {
  text-align: center;
  color: #eee;
}
.home {
  height: 40px;
  width: 100px;
  line-height: 30px;
  padding: 5px;
  border: 1px solid white;
  position: absolute;
  right: 10%;
  bottom: 10%;
  transition: 0.6s;
  cursor: pointer;
}
.home:hover {
  background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3);
}
a {
  display: block;
  text-decoration: none;
  font-size: 120%;
}

.page-enter-active, .page-leave-active{
  transition: 0.6s;
}
.page-enter, .page-leave-to{
  opacity: 0;
}


</style>
